person.persName: James H. Bridgewater (Lincoln County, Ky, soldier)

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, soldier. Virginia native. Married to Susan Dawes on July 10, 1854. Father of Volney A. Bridgewater and Sarah H. Bridgewater. Laborer in Lincoln County in 1860. Served in 3rd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as first sergeant from October 8, 1861, to June 6, 1863; 2nd lieutenant from June 6, 1863, to April 18, 1864; and 1st lieutenant from April 18, 1864. Served in Hall’s Gap Battalion as captain from June 1, 1864, to March 1, 1865, and major from March 1, 1865 to July 27, 1865.
